verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of the sons of Korah. Maschil. We have <S%H8085>heard<s%> with our <S%H241>ears<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, Our <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H5608>told<s%> <S%H6467>us<s%>, What work thou <S%H6466>didst<s%> in their <S%H3117>days<s%>, In the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6924>old<s%>.

Thou didst drive <S%H3423>out<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> with thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>; But them thou didst <S%H5193>plant<s%>: Thou didst <S%H7489>afflict<s%> the <S%H3816>peoples<s%>; But them thou didst spread <S%H7971>abroad<s%>.

For they <S%H3423>gat<s%> not the <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H3423>possession<s%> by their own <S%H2719>sword<s%>, Neither did their own <S%H2220>arm<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H3225>them<s%>; But thy right hand, and thine <S%H2220>arm<s%>, and the <S%H216>light<s%> of thy <S%H6440>countenance<s%>, Because thou wast favorable unto <S%H7521>them<s%>.
Thou art my <S%H4428>King<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>: <S%H6680>Command<s%> <S%H3444>deliverance<s%> for <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.
Through thee will we push <S%H5055>down<s%> our <S%H6862>adversaries<s%>: Through thy <S%H8034>name<s%> will we tread them <S%H947>under<s%> that rise up against <S%H6965>us<s%>.
For I will not <S%H982>trust<s%> in my <S%H7198>bow<s%>, Neither shall my <S%H2719>sword<s%> save <S%H3467>me<s%>.
But thou hast <S%H3467>saved<s%> us from our <S%H6862>adversaries<s%>, And hast put them to <S%H954>shame<s%> that hate <S%H8130>us<s%>.
In <S%H430>God<s%> have we made our <S%H1984>boast<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3034>long<s%>, And we will give thanks unto thy <S%H8034>name<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
But <S%H637><s%> now thou hast cast us <S%H2186>off<s%>, and brought us to <S%H3637>dishonor<s%>, And goest not <S%H3318>forth<s%> with our <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.
Thou makest us to <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H268>back<s%> from the <S%H6862>adversary<s%>; And they that <S%H8130>hate<s%> us take spoil for <S%H8154>themselves<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H5414>made<s%> us like <S%H6629>sheep<s%> appointed for <S%H3978>food<s%>, And hast <S%H2219>scattered<s%> us among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.
Thou <S%H4376>sellest<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> for <S%H1952>nought<s%>, And hast not <S%H7235>increased<s%> thy wealth by their <S%H4242>price<s%>.
Thou <S%H7760>makest<s%> us a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> to our <S%H7934>neighbors<s%>, A <S%H3933>scoffing<s%> and a <S%H7047>derision<s%> to them that are round about <S%H5439>us<s%>.
Thou <S%H7760>makest<s%> us a <S%H4912>byword<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, A <S%H4493>shaking<s%> of the <S%H7218>head<s%> among the <S%H3816>peoples<s%>.
All <S%H3117><s%> the day long is my <S%H1322>dishonor<s%> before <S%H1322>me<s%>, And the shame of my <S%H6440>face<s%> hath covered <S%H3680>me<s%>,
For the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of him that <S%H2778>reproacheth<s%> and <S%H1442>blasphemeth<s%>, By <S%H6440>reason<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy<s%> and the <S%H5358>avenger<s%>.
All this is <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H7911>us<s%>; Yet have we not forgotten <S%H8266>thee<s%>, Neither have we dealt falsely in thy <S%H1285>covenant<s%>.
Our <S%H3820>heart<s%> is not <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H268>back<s%>, Neither have our <S%H838>steps<s%> <S%H5186>declined<s%> from thy <S%H734>way<s%>,
That thou hast sore <S%H1794>broken<s%> us in the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H8577>jackals<s%>, And <S%H3680>covered<s%> us with the shadow of <S%H6757>death<s%>.
If we have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>, Or spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> our <S%H3709>hands<s%> to a <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H410>god<s%>;
Will not <S%H430>God<s%> search this <S%H2713>out<s%>? For he <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> the <S%H8587>secrets<s%> of the <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
Yea <S%H2026><s%>, for thy sake are we killed all the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H2803>long<s%>; We are accounted as <S%H6629>sheep<s%> for the <S%H2878>slaughter<s%>.
Awake <S%H5782><s%>, why <S%H3462>sleepest<s%> <S%H136>thou<s%>, O Lord? <S%H6974>Arise<s%>, cast us not <S%H2186>off<s%> for <S%H5331>ever<s%>.
Wherefore <S%H5641>hidest<s%> thou thy <S%H6440>face<s%>, And <S%H7911>forgettest<s%> our <S%H6040>affliction<s%> and our <S%H3906>oppression<s%>?
For our <S%H5315>soul<s%> is bowed <S%H7743>down<s%> to the <S%H6083>dust<s%>: Our <S%H990>body<s%> <S%H1692>cleaveth<s%> unto the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
Rise <S%H6965><s%> up for our <S%H5833>help<s%>, And <S%H6299>redeem<s%> us for thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>' sake.
